name: The Cavalry
body:
The Cavalry consists of a group of open-source enthusiasts who contribute to various projects.
The Light Locker project is hosted by The Cavalry on github.

# Light Locker
Light Locker is a simple locker (forked from gnome-screensaver) that aims to have simple, sane, secure defaults and be well integrated with the desktop while not carrying any desktop-specific dependencies.
The project is started to provide a lock screen for session switching with LightDM. It relies on lightdm for locking and unlocking your session.

## Features
* Compile-time and run-time configuration.
* Auto starts in the desktop environment.
* Lock the sessions when suspending the machine.
* Timed locking. Automatically lock the session after the screen saver starts.
* Delay VT switching (LightDM greeter) until the first user activity on a timed lock.
